Extracted Variables:
- x: number of units of chemical A added to the mixer
- y: number of units of chemical B added to the mixer

Definitions:
- x: number of units of chemical A added to the mixer
- y: number of units of chemical B added to the mixer

Extracted Constraints:
- Time constraint: 30x + 45y \leq T
- Chemical A constraint: x \geq 300
- Total chemical constraint: x + y \geq 1500
- Chemical ratio constraint: x \leq \frac{1}{3} y

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize the total time T = 30x + 45y
